```{r}
## <b>
library(ggthemes)
airquality <- filter(airquality, !is.na(Ozone))
tab <- airquality |>
  summarise(media = mean(Ozone), dp = sd(Ozone), mediana = median(Ozone))
write.csv2(tab, "tabela.csv")
## </b>

ggplot(airquality, aes(Ozone)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 8, fill = "blue") +
  theme_excel()
```
